recipe.title: Escarole and Butter Lettuce Salad with Pomegranate Seeds and Hazelnuts
ingredients: 1/4 cup Champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
1/2 cup grapeseed oil or olive oil
1 large head of escarole, coarsely torn
1 head of butter lettuce, coarsely torn
1 Granny Smith apple, quartered, cored, thinly sliced
instructions: Combine vinegar and next 6 ingredients in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.
Salad: Mix all ingredients in very large bowl. Toss with enough dressing to coat.
